definition: to be master; hence, to marry
kjvTranslation: have dominion (over), be husband, marry(-ried, [idiom] wife).

translations.bg: да бъда господар; оттам - да се оженя
translations.da: at være herre; derfor at gifte sig
translations.de: herr zu sein; also zu heiraten
translations.el: να είσαι κύριος, άρα, να παντρεύεσαι
translations.es: ser amo; por lo tanto, casarse
translations.id: untuk menjadi tuan; oleh karena itu, untuk menikah
translations.nb: å være herre; derav å gifte seg
translations.ro: a fi stăpân; prin urmare, a se căsători
translations.sv: att vara herre; följaktligen att gifta sig
